# Implementation Logs

This directory contains detailed implementation logs and summaries for various features and components of the Neural Trader project.

## Files

- **CLAUDE_IMPLEMENTATION_LOG.md** - Comprehensive log of Claude-assisted implementation sessions
- **FINAL_CONFORMAL_INTEGRATION_SUMMARY.md** - Summary of conformal prediction integration
- **NEURAL-TRADER-PREDICTOR-SUMMARY.md** - Neural trader predictor implementation details
- **WASM_BINDINGS_SUMMARY.md** - WebAssembly bindings implementation summary
- **WASM_IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md** - Guide for WASM implementation patterns

## Purpose

These logs serve as:
- Historical record of implementation decisions
- Reference for future maintenance and updates
- Documentation of complex integration patterns
- Onboarding material for new contributors

## Organization

Logs are organized by feature/component and include:
- Implementation approach and rationale
- Technical challenges and solutions
- Performance metrics and benchmarks
- Lessons learned and best practices
